_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Pterodactyl Client Discord Bot
author: adamfortney0@gmail.com
description:
Discord bot for pterodactyl that allows clients to control their servers using the Client API (server API key not needed)

Github:
https://github.com/AdamFortney/pterodactyl-client-discord-bot/tree/main

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# NodeJS App Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y git

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "$(ls /mnt/server)" ]; then
    echo "Existing app found, pulling updated version"
    git pull
else
    echo -e "Path empty, downloading bot"
        git clone https://github.com/AdamFortney/pterodactyl-client-discord-bot.git .
fi
echo "Installing nodejs packages"

/usr/local/bin/npm install
echo "Node packages installed"

echo "Deleting extra files"
mv ./github_content/example.env ./.env
rm .dockerignore
rm .gitignore
rm dockerfile
rm README.md
rm LICENSE
rm -r ./github_content

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0
